reviews.review: If you've never heard or seen Portal then it's time to get with the times! This is a 10 out of 10, brilliant, hilarious, innovative single-player & co-op game where you'll have a once in a lifetime experience with only a blue & orange portal to explore and complete puzzles!
the pinnacle of puzzle gaming. still waiting for the third one.
the bossfight is very fun, game is fun in general.
love this game very good very good wheatley is my pride and joy
Ã‰ goxtozin a experiencia que esse jogo te da. UwU
i burn my money for flex paste but i dont burn my money to this game 9/10 cuz my friend is gay

What can I say that thousands of people haven't said already? This game is amazing in almost every sense of the word and I just HAD to give this game a recommend. If you haven't tried this game or even Portal 1 for that matter, try them! You'd be missing out on two very amazing games.
This is a very great game! The story mode is compelling, and long, and it even comes with a test chamber editor, unlike the first game.
It is a really good logic game
i dont want your damn lemons

smart and hilariously written dialogue, great world building loaded with details, music accenting everything flawlessly, on point level design, just enough challenge in the puzzles. 10/10 execution. one of my top 5 game experiences of all time.
I LOVE GLaDOS and I'll love her forever.

Portal 2 is one of the few games that I have purchased on 4 separate occasions. The atmosphere the game provides is very unique and interesting. It allows for some genuine challenge that differs from the typical difficulty of modern FPSs, as this is a puzzle game. This game, like many other games made by valve, is a masterpiece. It is insane that it has not, and likely will not receive a sequel. At least we have two solid entries in the franchise that still hold up over a decade later.

I've played through this game maybe 3 or 4 times now and i still have fun listening to wheatley's and GlaDOS' antics. 10 years old and stands up incredibly well. You should really play it if you haven't
Must-play all time classic. Don't forget to play through an incredible amount of amazing community maps!

It's boring, the atmosphere is well put together but it just feels too repetitive and the story is non-existent.
It would be awesome to use the same idea of portals in an open world tho, or in an adventure/action game

In Portal 2 Ã¼bernehmen wir erneut die Rolle des Testsubjektes aus dem ersten Teil. Nach einem anscheinend ewigen Schlaf wachen wir in einer komplett zerstÃ¶rten Testeinrichtung auf und mÃ¼ssen unseren Weg hinaus finden. Das gestaltet sich jedoch schwerer als erwartet und wir treffen wieder auf eine alte Bekannte. Diesmal bringt uns unsere Reise auch in die alten Einrichtungen von Aperture Science im Untergrund.

Positives:
- Neue, noch herausfordendere RÃ¤tsel 
- Fortzsetzung der grandiosen Story aus dem ersten teil
- Neue, witzige Charaktere
- Spiel geht diesmal lÃ¤nger
- Koop Modus in dem man zusammen RÃ¤tsel lÃ¶sen muss

Negatives:
- gibts nichts

Fazit:
 
Portal 2 ist ein gelungener Nachfolger zum groÃŸartigen ersten Teil. Mit neuen RÃ¤tsel und einer lÃ¤ngeren Story Line kÃ¶nnen wir diesmal noch tiefer in die Welt von Aperture Science eintauchen. Kann das Spiel auf jeden Fall nur empfehlen!

Probably one of my favorite games. I've played Portal 1 and 2 since I was in high school and it's a masterpiece both in gameplay and storytelling. It's fun to play, engaging, challenging, and most of all, it is satisfying. The test chambers are well-crafted and the voice acting is superb. Too bad I don't have anybody t play co-op with lol.

Even a decade after first playing this game, it still delivers an amazing story that draws you in with the gameplay and lore. 10/10 would Portal again.
